omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		d.DiagnosisCode,
		line01.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
		line01.NHSNumber,
		line01.CDSActivityDate
from omop_staging.cds_diagnosis d
	inner join omop_staging.cds_line01 line01
		on d.MessageId = line01.MessageId
where line01.NHSNumber is not null;

omopColumns.name: condition_source_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Resolve ICD10 codes to OMOP concepts. If code cannot be mapped, map using the parent code.
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		d.DiagnosisCode,
		line01.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
		line01.NHSNumber,
		line01.CDSActivityDate
from omop_staging.cds_diagnosis d
	inner join omop_staging.cds_line01 line01
		on d.MessageId = line01.MessageId
where line01.NHSNumber is not null;

omopColumns.name: condition_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Converts ICD10/OPCS4 concepts to SNOMED concepts.

omopColumns.name: condition_start_date
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		d.DiagnosisCode,
		line01.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
		line01.NHSNumber,
		line01.CDSActivityDate
from omop_staging.cds_diagnosis d
	inner join omop_staging.cds_line01 line01
		on d.MessageId = line01.MessageId
where line01.NHSNumber is not null;

omopColumns.name: condition_source_value
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		d.DiagnosisCode,

omopColumns.name: condition_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32020`. EHR encounter diagnosis

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		d.DiagnosisCode,
		line01.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
		line01.NHSNumber,
		line01.CDSActivityDate
from omop_staging.cds_diagnosis d
	inner join omop_staging.cds_line01 line01
		on d.MessageId = line01.MessageId
where line01.NHSNumber is not null;
